extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Our village may be small and humble, but we still offer a selection of cutting-edge weaponry!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Notre village est peut-être petit, mais nous offrons quand même des armes dernier cri !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Welcome Homestedt folks!\. Anything catching your eye?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Bonjour, habitants de \v[area.evo-village.name] !\. Quelque chose attire votre attention ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Okay.\. Let's see what Tronny's up to.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: OK.\. Voyons voir ce que Tronny mijote.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: SALUT !!

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: LEA !!

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Chérie !!

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Finally you're back!!\. It felt like forever!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Enfin tu es revenue !!\. Ça faisait une éternité !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I missed you sooo much!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Tu m'as tellement manqué !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Things were just not the same without you...
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Les choses n'étaient pas les mêmes sans toi...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Welcome back, dear!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Rebonjour, chérie !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Hi!!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Salut !!

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: You seem as lively as ever.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Toujours aussi joyeuse qu'avant.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Hi!!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Salut !!

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Welcome back to CrossWorlds.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Rebienvenue à CrossWorlds.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I'm glad that everything worked out.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Je suis content que tout se soit bien passé.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Why?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Pourquoi ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Yes, about the others...
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Ah oui, pour les autres...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Lukas and Buggy wanted to show up as well.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Lukas et Buggy voulaient venir aussi.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: There must have been some hold up.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Quelque chose à du les retenir.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: As for Apollo and Joern, they send their regards.\. They are currently on vacation.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Et pour Apollo et Joern, ils t'ont envoyés leurs amitiés.\. Ils sont actuellement en vacances.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Now, now, dear.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Mais bon, chérie.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: The news of your comeback came on very short notice.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: La nouvelle à propos de ton retour est arrivée assez rapidement.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: And it has been quite a long time. Almost 7 months, wasn't it?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Et ça fait déjà depuis un long moment. Presque 7 mois, pas vrai ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Yes, the negotiations with Instatainment took a while.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Oui, les négociations avec Instatainment ont pris un moment.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: And even after we came to an agreement, a lot of things had to be prepared.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Et même une fois parvenus à un accord, il a fallu préparer un tas de choses.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Oui!\. Just look around you!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Oui !\. Regarde un peu tout autour !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: They built a whole new place for you!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Ils ont construit un nouvel endroit entier pour toi !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: That is right. Welcome to \c[3]Homestedt\c[0]!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: C'est exact. Bienvenue à \c[3]\v[area.evo-village.name]\c[0] !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: A whole location dedicated to Evotars like you and Satoshi.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Un endroit entier dédié aux Évotars comme toi et Satoshi.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Thanks!!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Merci !!

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: And of course you even got your very own house, Lea!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Et bien entendu tu as même ta propre maison, Lea !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: It's right over here!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Elle est juste là !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Follow everyone to your house in \c[3]Homestedt - Centrum\c[0].
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Suivez tout le monde dans votre maison au \c[3]Centre de \v[area.evo-village.name]\c[0].

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Creating Evotars of his employees, huh?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Il a crée des Évotars de ses employés, hein ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I honestly wouldn't know about it.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Honnêtement, je ne l'aurais jamais su.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Back then, I was constantly busy maintaining and improving the Evotar technology, among other things.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: À l'époque, j'étais bien trop occupé à maintenir et a améliorer la technologie Évotar, entre autres.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: But I was never really aware of what people exactly ended up on the server.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Mais je n'étais jamais vraiment au courant des gens qui atterrissaient sur le serveur.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Look at this! Isn't it amazing?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Regarde ça ! C'est pas merveilleux ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Such a fancy little place, just for you!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Une petite maison, rien que pour toi !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I'm almost jealous!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: J'en suis presque jalouse !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Come on, let's go inside!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Allez, Rentrons à l'intérieur !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Hi!!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Salut !!

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Guten Tag!\. Sorry for being late!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Guten Tag !\. Désolé pour le retard !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Hi!!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Salut !!

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Our favorite bot is finally back!\. Hello!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Notre bot favori est enfin de retour !\. Bonjour !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: So...\. Did you already show her around the village?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Donc...\. Est-ce que vous lui avez déjà montré le village ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: We just started! We only went to her house so far.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: On viens juste de commencer ! On a juste vu sa maison pour l'instant.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I see!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Je vois !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I was hoping to give you one of my signature tours!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: J'espérais vous faire faire une visite comme vous en aviez l'habitude !
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.note: de: "alors il n'est pas trop tard pour une de mes typique visite de la ville", or something

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I could pick up right where you left off.\. How about it?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Je pourrais continuer ce que vous avez commencé.\. Qu'en dites vous ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Go ahead, monsieur!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Après vous, monsieur !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Okay! Let's take a little walk, then!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: OK ! Allons faire un tour alors !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Participate in Lukas' tour of \c[3]Homestedt\c[0].
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Participez à la visite par Lukas de \c[3]\v[area.evo-village.name]\c[0].

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Right now we're in the residence part of the village.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Pour le moment nous nous trouvons dans la partie résidentielle du village.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Most of these lovely houses are still vacant.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: La plupart de ces maisons sont encore vacantes.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: But I heard that things won't stay that way for long.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Mais j'ai cru comprendre que cela ne le restera pas très longtemps.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: As it is, though, there isn't much to see here!\. Let's go on!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: C'est pourquoi il n'y a pas grand chose à voir pour l'instant !\. Continuons plus loin !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I find the lack of laser bridge disturbing.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Je trouve ce manque de pont laser très perturbant.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Here's the local teleporter.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Voici le téléporteur local.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: All you need to quickly beam yourself home.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Tout ce dont vous avez besoin pour se téléporter chez soi.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Don't leave right away, though. Our little tour isn't over yet.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Mais ne partez pas encore, notre petite visite n'est pas encore terminée.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: There is this suspicious empty spot over there, in the middle of the river.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Voyez-vous cet endroit vide là-bas, au beau milieu de la rivière ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Apparently a statue was supposed to be built there, but it wasn't completed on time.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Une statue devait se dresser ici, mais elle n'a pas pu être terminée à temps.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: More like people could not decide on a design...
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: C'est plutôt que personne ne s'est mis d'accord sur le design...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: And onward!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Et on continue !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: The local marketplace!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Le marché local !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Quite surprising for such a small village to have its own market, don't you think?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: C'est assez surprenant pour un aussi petit village d'avoir son propre marché, vous ne trouvez pas ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Let's hope that the local folks can provide the expected demand!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Espérons que les habitants du coin puissent faire vivre ces marchands !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Now let's go to a very special building.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Et maintenant, continuons vers un bâtiment spécial.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Look at this mansion!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Regardez cette villa !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Pretty, isn't it?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: C'est chic, pas vrai ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Of course, this building already has a lucky owner.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Bien-entendu, ce bâtiment possède déjà un propriétaire.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Isn't that right, Herr Sakai?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: N'est-ce pas, Herr Sakai ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Uhm, yes.\. That's where I live.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Euh, oui.\. J'habite là.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: That's huge!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: C'est gigantesque !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Why doesn't Lea get a building like this?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Pourquoi est-ce que Lea n'a pas une maison aussi grosse ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Why?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Pourquoi ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: For some reason Instatainment felt the need to give Satoshi special treatment.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Instatainment a jugé bon de donner à Satoshi un traitement spécial.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: The perks of being the former star employee.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: C'est l'avantage d'être un ancien employé vedette.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I didn't really ask for it, you know?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Je ne l'ai pas vraiment demandé, vous savez ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: In any case...\. Feel free to drop by whenever you like.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: En tout cas...\. passe me voir quand tu en as envie.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: It's much more space than I'd ever need anyway.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: C'est bien trop grand pour moi tout seul de toute façon.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Let's go to our final stop!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Et allons vers notre destination finale !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: And here we stand in front of the largest building of the village.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Et nous voilà en face du plus grand bâtiment du village.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: The town hall!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: L'hôtel de ville !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: If I'm not mistaken, that's where you must have started, right?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Si je ne me trompe pas, c'est là que vous avez commencé, pas vrai ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: There's more to discover in that building, actually!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Mais il y a d'autres choses à découvrir dans ce bâtiment !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Like a whole conference hall for instance!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Comme une grande salle de conférence, par exemple !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Aaaand...
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Eeeeet...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: This concludes my little tour of \c[3]Homestedt\c[0]!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Cela achève ma petite visite de \c[3]\v[area.evo-village.name]\c[0] !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I hope you enjoyed!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: J'espère que cela vous a plu !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Thanks!!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Merci !!

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Hm?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Hm ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: ...Wait?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: ... Attends ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Is something the matter with me?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Quelque chose ne va pas avec moi ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Oh... let me guess.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Oh... laisse-moi deviner.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: You are probably wondering about the \c[3]other Lukas\c[0], correct?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Tu es probablement en train de te demander pour l'\c[3]autre Lukas\c[0], correct ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Yes, we will get right to that now.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Oui, il faut qu'on s'occupe de ça maintenant.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: We have been planning to get him into the game right after you!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Nous avions prévu de le ramener dans le jeu juste après toi !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: That's a very nice place to live in.\. Thank you very much!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: C'est vraiment sympa comme petit pied à terre.\. Merci beaucoup !
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.note: de: comme petit lopin de terre

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Japp, you better be happy!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Japp, tu peux t'estimer heureux !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: We both know what I have to live with in real life!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: On sait déjà tous les deux ce que je dois endurer dans la vie réelle !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I sure do...
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Ah oui, ça je l'sais...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Well then, it is time to go back to the Playground!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Bon alors, il est temps de retourner sur le Terrain de Jeu !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Let me show you where Homestedt is exactly located.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Laissez-moi vous montrer où \v[area.evo-village.name] se situe vraiment.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Follow Sergey and the others to the southern exit of \c[3]Homestedt\c[0].
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Suivez Sergey et les autres à la sortie sur de \c[3]\v[area.evo-village.name]\c[0].

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Hi!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Salut !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Hey!\. This front yard is a bit small, but nice.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Hé !\. Ce jardin à l'entrée est un peu petit, mais très sympa.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Well, it certainly beats that horrible place we've been stuck in before.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Mais bon, à côté de cette friche industrielle, c'est vraiment le paradis.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: And we're supposed to meet up at the \c[3]First Scholar HQ\c[0] later, right?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Et on est censé rencontrer les autres au \c[3]QG des Premiers Érudits\c[0] plus tard, c'est ça ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I sure hope I'll still be able to find it.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: J'espère que je réussirais à le retrouver.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I'm just joking!\. I still remember where it is.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Je rigole !\. Je me souviens encore où il est.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Et il a dit qu'il pourrait trouver un moyen de l'enlever !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Right...\. I did say that.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Oui...\. J'ai dis ça.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: That's why I'm looking forward to a \c[1]fair\c[0] and \c[1]honorable duel\c[0]!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: C'est pour ça que je suis impatient d'avoir un \c[1]duel honorable\c[0] et \c[1]équitable\c[0] !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: However, I'd like to make a suggestion!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Mais, je souhaite faire une suggestion !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Let's hold our duel after we've \c[3]explored the new area\c[0]!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Faisons notre duel après avoir \c[3]exploré la nouvelle zone\c[0] !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: That way we can gather better equipment and rise to our full potential!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Comme cela, on peut obtenir un meilleur équipement et développer tout notre potentiel !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: You can get to the new area via the \c[3]southwest beach of Rhombus Square\c[0]!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Tu peux atteindre la nouvelle zone via la \c[3]plage sud-ouest de \v[area.rhombus-sqr.name]\c[0] !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I heard it's quite the nice place.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: J'ai cru comprendre que c'était un coin très sympa.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Oh!\. They released the new location today?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Oh !\. Ils ont sorti la nouvelle zone aujourd'hui ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: We should totally explore it together!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Il faut absolument qu'on l'explore ensemble !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: You too, Tronny!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Toi aussi, Tronny !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Sure...\. we can do that.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Bien sûr...\. On peut faire comme ça.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Just tell us when you want to make a party, Lea!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Dis-le-nous si tu veux former un groupe, Lea !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: See you around!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: À plus tard !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Be prepared, Spheromancer Lea!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Soit prête, Spheromanceuse Lea !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Bye!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Bye !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: By the way, love the village.\. Great place!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: D'ailleurs, j'adore ce village.\. C'est vraiment sympa !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: See you soon!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: À bientôt !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: They all just had to arrive at the same time, huh?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Il fallait qu'ils arrivent tous au même moment, hein ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: That new area sounds interesting, though.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Cette nouvelle zone à l'air intéressante, par contre.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I might check that out as well.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Peut-être que j'irais y faire un tour.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Enter the new area via \c[3]Rhombus Square - SW Beach\c[0].
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Entrez dans la nouvelle zone via la \c[3]Plage Sud-ouest de \v[area.rhombus-sqr.name]\c[0].

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: See what C'tron and Satoshi are up to in \c[3]Homestedt - Centrum\c[0].
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Voyez ce que C'tron et Satoshi mijotent au \c[3]Centre de \v[area.evo-village.name]\c[0].

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Hi!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Salut !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Oh!\. Welcome back, Lea.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Oh !\. Rebonjour, Lea.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Did you like the new area?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Tu as apprécié la nouvelle zone ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: [shakes head]
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: [secoue la tête]

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Yes
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Oui

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: No
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Non

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Heh...\. I'll forward that feedback to the developers!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Ha...\. je transmettrais tes impressions au développeurs !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Why?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Pourquoi ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Hm?\. What's the matter?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Hmm ?\. Qu'est-ce qu'il y a ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Maybe she's wondering what we're both up to.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Peut-être qu'elle se demande ce qu'on trafique.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Obviously, we were discussing our plans on achieving Evotar supremacy.\. Care to join us?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Naturellement, on était en train de discuter de nos plans pour atteindre la suprématie des Évotars.\. Tu veux nous rejoindre ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Haha!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Haha !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: We were just having a little chat, nothing special about it.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: On était juste en train de discuter, rien de plus.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Well, actually...
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Bon, en fait...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I told Satoshi about my \c[3]working relationship with Sidwell\c[0].
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: J'ai parlé à Satoshi de ma \c[3]collaboration avec Sidwell\c[0].

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I felt like I had to apologize for all the things I've contributed to.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Il fallait que je m'excuse pour tout ce à quoi j'ai contribué.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Apology accepted.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Excuses acceptées.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: A lot of people were involved in the whole thing.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Tant de personnes ont été impliquées dans cette histoire.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Being forced to do things they didn't stand for.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: À être forcé à faire des choses qu'ils ne voulaient pas.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Just like \c[3]Gautham\c[0].
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Comme \c[3]Gautham\c[0].

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: May he rest in peace.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Qu'il puisse reposer en paix.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I don't think we ever had the chance to meet before Homestedt, did we?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Je ne crois pas que nous ayons eu la chance de nous rencontrer avant \v[area.evo-village.name], pas vrai ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I don't think so...
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Je ne crois pas...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I suppose Sidwell must have had other people working for him without us being aware.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: J'imagine que Sidwell devait avoir d'autres personnes qui travaillent pour lui sans qu'on soit au courant.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: So what was it like, working for him?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Donc qu'est-ce que ça fait, de travailler pour lui ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: And how did you get involved in the first place?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Et comment tu as été impliqué là-dedans ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Well...\. I still don't remember most things all that clearly, unfortunately.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Bien...\. Je me souviens pas encore très bien de tout, malheureusement.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I think I was a student back then?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Je crois que j'étais un étudiant à l'époque ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I think someone got in touch with me over email.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Il me semble que quelqu'un m'a contacté par e-mail.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I guess in the end it was just a little side gig.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Au final, ça devait être un petit boulot.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Watching specific players, gathering information, reporting back...
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Surveiller certains joueurs, récolter des informations, faire un rapport...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: You essentially earned money while playing a game...
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: On gagnait de l'argent en jouant à un jeu...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Why?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Pourquoi ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I'm sorry, Lea.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Je suis désolé, Lea.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I really regret the whole thing ever since I got to know you better.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Je regrette sincèrement tout ça depuis que j'ai appris à te connaitre.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: And then your avatar ended up on the Evotar Server.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Et ensuite ton avatar s'est retrouvé sur le Serveur des Évotars.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: To me, that's the strangest part, really.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Pour moi, c'est la partie la plus étrange, vraiment.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Yeah, I can only guess why that happened.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Oui, je ne l'explique pas non plus.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Maybe Sidwell wanted access to more information from his employees?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Peut-être que Sidwell voulait avoir plus d'information de ses employés ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I suppose that might be.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Ça pourrait être ça.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: It's certainly useful to blackmail your people into submission.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: C'est sans doute pratique pour faire du chantage pour vous forcer à collaborer.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Let's hope that we'll find all the answers as my memory returns.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Éspérons qu'on trouvera toutes les réponses quand mes souvenirs reviendrons.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I'm feeling tired.\. Guess it's time for a small nap.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Je me sens vraiment fatigué.\. Peut-être qu'il est temps de roupiller un peu.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: See you tomorrow!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: À demain !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Bye!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Bye !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Good night!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Bonne nuit !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Hello Lea!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Salut Lea !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Hi!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Salut !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I am currently over at the Cargo Ship to pay Carla and Jet a small visit.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Je suis actuellement sur le Porte-Conteneur pour rendre visite à Carla et Jet.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: They would love to see you again as well.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Ils adoreraient pouvoir te revoir.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: So I activated the landmark in the cargo hold.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Donc j'ai activé le point de repère dans la soute.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Why don't you quickly drop by?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Pourquoi est-ce que tu passerais pas ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Visit Jet and the others at the \c[3]Cargo Ship\c[0]!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Rendez visite à Jet et aux autres sur le \c[3]Porte-Conteneur\c[0] !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Next time you plan to interrogate someone, please let me know first.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: La prochaine fois que tu prévois d'interroger quelqu'un, s'il te plait, dis-le-moi avant.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I understand that all of this must be quite personal to you.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Je comprends que tout cela soit très personnel pour toi.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: But we all want to learn the whole story.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Mais au final, on veut tous connaitre le fin mot de l'histoire.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: And we definitely need to collaborate to get there.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Et il faut absolument que l'on collabore pour y arriver.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Sorry.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Désolée.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Well, today certainly was an important step.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Bon, aujourd'hui c'était probablement une étape importante.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Let us hope that C'tron remembers more of his past.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Espérons que C'tron se souvienne plus de son passé.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Because I am still puzzled about the fact he ended up on that Evotar Server.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Parce que je suis toujours perplexe qu'il se soit retrouvé sur ce Serveur des Évotars.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Especially if he truly is Sidwell's Evotar.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Surtout si c'est réellement l'Évotar de Sidwell.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I will be going then.\. Make sure to get some sleep, Lea.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Je vais y aller alors.\. Fait en sorte de dormir un peu, Lea.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Bye.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Bye.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Eh bien...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: C'est quoi les nouvelles, Monsieur Asimov ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Tonight, we will be able to sneak into Vermillion Wasteland one last time.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Ce soir, on pourra entrer en cachette à \v[area.arid.name] une dernière fois.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Tronny, à lui tout seul ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Tronny !!

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Hé...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: On a pris notre décision !\. \c[3]Tu peux rester\c[0] !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Q-Quoi ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: For real?!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: V-Vraiment ?!

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Oui!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Oui !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Of course, we hope to have your full support in trying to catch Sidwell.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Bien sûr, on compte sur ton entière collaboration pour essayer d'attrapper Sidwell.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: That...\. That goes without saying!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Ça...\. Ça va sans le dire !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I...\. I really don't know what to say...
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Je...\. Je ne sais vraiment pas quoi dire...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Thanks...
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Merci...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Thank you so much!!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Merci beaucoup !!

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: As you probably know, Lea cannot write.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Comme vous le savez sans doute déjà, Lea ne peut pas écrire.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: However, I found a way for her to look for words reasonably fast!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Mais par contre, j'ai trouvé un moyen pour qu'elle puisse chercher des mots suffisamment rapidement !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: And here it is, the \c[3]Lea-Board\c[0]!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Et la voilà, la \c[3]Lea-Board\c[0] !
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.note: "ouais t'a vu ma board" works for so many things...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: How about a demonstration, Lea?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Que dirais-tu d'une petite démonstration, Lea ?
\c[2][Salut !] [Lea !] [Pourquoi ?]\c[0]
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.note: that's right, "remove horns" would have been better :)

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Wow!\. Amazing improvement!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Ouah !\. Quelle grande amélioration !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Lea, please!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Lea, s'il te plait !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: \c[2][Hello my name is Lea!]\c[0]
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: \c[2][Bonjour, je m'appelle Lea !]\c[0]

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Woah!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Wouah !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Cherie, finally you can communicate!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Chérie, enfin on peut communiquer !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Tell me all your hobbies!\. Right now!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Parle-moi de tous tes hobbys !\. Maintenant !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: \c[2][Can't...\. find...\. words...]
\s[5]Noooooooooooooooooo~
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: \s[5]Noooooooooooooooooon~

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Well, it is a start!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Bon, c'est que le début !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Finally, after plenty of redesigns...
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Finalement, après de nombreux changements de design...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Today, we can proudly present to you:
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Aujourd'hui, nous pouvons enfin vous présenter :

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Homestedt's very own \c[3]monument\c[0]!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Le véritable \c[3]monument\c[0] de \v[area.evo-village.name] !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: WHAT?!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: QUOI ?!

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: It's a HUGE LEA!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: C'est une LEA GÉANTE !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Wow!\. Nice!\. I honestly expected a display of Satoshi.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Waouh !\. Sympa !\. Je m'attendais vraiment à une représentation de Satoshi.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Truth is...\. that's what they were originally planning.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: La vérité c'est...\. ce qu'ils avaient originellement prévu de faire.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: But I managed to talk them out of it.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Mais par chance j'ai réussi à les en dissuader.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Congratulations, sister.\. You deserve it!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Félicitation, petite sœur.\. Tu l'as vraiment mérité !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Thanks...
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Merci...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Thanks!\. Thanks!\. Thanks!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Merci !\. Merci !\. Merci !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Hi!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Salut !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Hey there!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Tiens, bonjour !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Man, I sure wish we could do something in these gardens.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Et ben, Si seulement on pouvait faire quelque chose dans ces jardins.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Right now it's really all just decoration.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Pour l'instant, c'est uniquement de la décoration.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I'd love to plant my own stuff here.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: J'aurais adoré pouvoir planter mes propre trucs ici.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Why?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Pourquoi ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Why...?\. Well...\. I guess we can't really use any of the fruits either.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Pourquoi... ?\. Bon...\. J'imagine qu'on ne peut pas vraiment profiter des fruits non-plus.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: But seeing how they made the effort of giving us kitchens...\. who knows!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Mais vu qu'ils ont fait l'effort de nous offrir une cuisine...\. qui sait !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Maybe we'll be able to cook!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Peut-être qu'on pourra cuisiner !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Then I'll invite you to my world-famous apple pancakes!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Et ensuite je t'inviterais à mes fameuses crêpes au pommes mondialement connues !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: We should place some tables and chairs outside, don't you think?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: On devrait mettre quelque tables et des chaises dehors, tu penses pas ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Oh Junge...
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Oh, Junge...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Let me see if I can get something from inside my house...
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Voyons voir si je peux aller chercher quelque chose chez moi...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: So...\. I can just put those on the grill?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Donc...\. Je peux simplement les mettre sur le grill ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Yes, as far as I understood...
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Oui, de ce que j'ai compris...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Just like the real thing?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Comme si c'était des vrais ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Pretty much...
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Oui...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Just much harder to burn, I heard!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: C'est juste bien plus difficile à cramer, à ce qui parait !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Pfff!\. Easy mode!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Pfff !\. C'est le mode facile ça !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Man, I can't wait!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Bon sang, je peux plus attendre !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: \c[2][ Hungry! ]\c[2]
Don't you feel a little bit worried?\. I heard we're the first players to eat this stuff.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Vous n'êtes pas un peu inquiets ?\. J'ai cru comprendre qu'on serait les premiers joueurs à manger ça.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Come on, it will be delicious!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Allez, ça va être délicieux !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Greeting, townsfolk of Homestedt!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Salutations, peuple de \v[area.evo-village.name] !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Looks like we arrived on time!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: On dirait qu'on est arrivé à temps !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Come on!\. Tell me he'll show up, too!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Allez !\. Il faut que tu me dises s'il va venir !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Buggy, please...
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Buggy, s'il te plait...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Your stakeholder friend has to be here!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Ton ami 'stakeholder' doit forcément venir !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Who else is supposed to handle the meat?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Qui d'autre pourra s'occuper des steaks ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: \s[5]Nyahahahahahahahahahahahahaha!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: \s[5]Nyahahahahahahahahahahahahaha !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: How often do you plan to repeat that joke?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Combien de fois tu comptes répéter cette blague ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Satoshi!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Satoshi !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Get off your desk already!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Tu vas quitter ton bureau à la fin ?!

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Thank you for playing!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Merci d'avoir joué !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Reset back to before you embarked to Evotarground?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Revenir en arrière au moment juste avant d'avoir embarqué sur le Terrain des Évotars ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Yes
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Oui
